DataElement.preferredName: Measurable Disease Prior Irradiated Field Present Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to measurable disease being present in area which was formerly treated with radiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Measurable Disease Prior Irradiated Field Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to measurable disease being present in area which was formerly treated with radiation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Capable of being measured.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Treated with radiation.:The region in which a particular type of force can be observed, often viewed as a space which was modified by the sources of the force which the field represents.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The region in which a particular type of force can be observed, often viewed as a space which was modified by the sources of the force which the field represents.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
